stories.original_summary: Scientists in Australia have uncovered a clever new way to fight some of the most dangerous drug-resistant bacteria by targeting a sugar that exists only on bacterial cells. stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Discover Sweet Bane for Foul Blights!
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has unearthed a clever new way to combat unseen blights that plague the lands. They found a unique arcane dust present only on these foul sprites. By crafting enchanted wards to recognize this dust, the alchemists guide the body's innate magic to cleanse the affliction.

stories.fantasy_headline: Grand Bazaar Offers Charming Gifts for the Day of Hearts!
stories.fantasy_story: The annual Day of Hearts approaches swiftly, and the Guild of Merchants prepares a grand bazaar. Many delightful trinkets and enchanted artifacts are offered at special coin discounts. These charming items are perfect for showing affection to loved ones before the celebrations begin.

stories.fantasy_headline: Arcane Road Guides May Soon Hear Many Speaking Spirits!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Artificers' Guild whispers of a new enchantment for their Arcane Road Guides. Soon, travelers might choose which speaking spirit or oracle answers their spoken spell commands. This means more magical wisdom could aid journeys, beyond the usual familiar voices.
